notes: It's a stronger version of [[Morshabaal]] and [[Enraged Morshabaal]] and shares most of its properties with them, except that it takes less damage and reflects more damage.
sounds: You are starting to annoy me!
I will restore our family honor!
name: Furious Morshabaal
location: Morshabaal appears inside a teleporter that spawns at the stone circle in the northwest of [[Edron]], {{Mapper Coords|129.94|123.213|7|3|text=here}}. Only characters of level 150 or higher can enter
